item.title: Kotlin Stackoverflow error

item.description: Java interop is one of the best features of the Kotlin language, yet sometimes this also can cause unforeseen issues… Puzzle # Disclaimer, the example below is a consequence of legacy code and only serves to demonstrate a Kotlin puzzler.
